page.title: 14CRIME IN N. BRISTOL
page.content: Police station on Southmead Road deals with all local crime.200 police men & women work covering a 24 hour period.Most common crimes -{burglary}& {car theft.}On estate,drink related crimes ie assualt,drink driving,domestic disputes are common.{Shoplifting }is prevalent in Southmead shops.Road traffic accidents are common on fast through roads - Greystoke,Southmead & Doncaster Roads.Southmead has the{highest %}of {juveniles}committing crime in Bristol.Good community scheme exists with police involved in promoting good relationships with children in schools & within the community.Recent "stop & ask a policeman" card collection scheme,visits with dogs,horses & police cars in schools are common place.
